actions.name: AllocateStaticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to create a static IP address that can be attached to an instance

actions.name: AttachCertificateToDistribution
actions.description: Grants permission to attach an SSL/TLS certificate to your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: AttachDisk
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a disk to an instance

actions.name: AttachInstancesToLoadBalancer
actions.description: Grants permission to attach one or more instances to a load balancer

actions.name: AttachLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a TLS certificate to a load balancer

actions.name: AttachStaticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to attach a static IP address to an instance

actions.name: CloseInstancePublicPorts
actions.description: Grants permission to close a public port of an instance

actions.name: CopySnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to copy a snapshot from one AWS Region to another in Amazon Lightsail

actions.name: CreateBucket
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: CreateBucketAccessKey
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new access key for the specified bucket

actions.name: CreateCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to create an SSL/TLS certificate

actions.name: CreateCloudFormationStack
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new Amazon EC2 instance from an exported Amazon Lightsail snapshot

actions.name: CreateContactMethod
actions.description: Grants permission to create an email or SMS text message contact method

actions.name: CreateContainerService
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: CreateContainerServiceDeployment
actions.description: Grants permission to create a deployment for your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: CreateContainerServiceRegistryLogin
actions.description: Grants permission to create a temporary set of log in credentials that you can use to log in to the Docker process on your local machine

actions.name: CreateDisk
actions.description: Grants permission to create a disk

actions.name: CreateDiskFromSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a disk from snapshot

actions.name: CreateDiskSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a disk snapshot

actions.name: CreateDistribution
actions.description: Grants permission to create an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: CreateDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to create a domain resource for the specified domain name

actions.name: CreateDomainEntry
actions.description: Grants permission to create one or more DNS record entries for a domain resource: Address (A), canonical name (CNAME), mail exchanger (MX), name server (NS), start of authority (SOA), service locator (SRV), or text (TXT)

actions.name: CreateInstanceSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create an instance snapshot

actions.name: CreateInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to create one or more instances

actions.name: CreateInstancesFromSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create one or more instances based on an instance snapshot

actions.name: CreateKeyPair
actions.description: Grants permission to create a key pair used to authenticate and connect to an instance

actions.name: CreateLoadBalancer
actions.description: Grants permission to create a load balancer

actions.name: CreateLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to create a load balancer TLS certificate

actions.name: CreateRelationalDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new relational database

actions.name: CreateRelationalDatabaseFromSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new relational database from a snapshot

actions.name: CreateRelationalDatabaseSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to create a relational database snapshot

actions.name: DeleteAlarm
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an alarm

actions.name: DeleteAutoSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an automatic snapshot of an instance or disk

actions.name: DeleteBucket
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: DeleteBucketAccessKey
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an access key for the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: DeleteCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an SSL/TLS certificate

actions.name: DeleteContactMethod
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a contact method

actions.name: DeleteContainerImage
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a container image that is registered to your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: DeleteContainerService
actions.description: Grants permission to delete your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: DeleteDisk
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a disk

actions.name: DeleteDiskSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a disk snapshot

actions.name: DeleteDistribution
actions.description: Grants permission to delete your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: DeleteDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a domain resource and all of its DNS records

actions.name: DeleteDomainEntry
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a DNS record entry for a domain resource

actions.name: DeleteInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an instance

actions.name: DeleteInstanceSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an instance snapshot

actions.name: DeleteKeyPair
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a key pair used to authenticate and connect to an instance

actions.name: DeleteKnownHostKeys
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the known host key or certificate used by the Amazon Lightsail browser-based SSH or RDP clients to authenticate an instance

actions.name: DeleteLoadBalancer
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a load balancer

actions.name: DeleteLoadBalancerTlsCertificate
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a load balancer TLS certificate

actions.name: DeleteRelationalDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a relational database

actions.name: DeleteRelationalDatabaseSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a relational database snapshot

actions.name: DetachCertificateFromDistribution
actions.description: Grants permission to detach an SSL/TLS certificate from your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: DetachDisk
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a disk from an instance

actions.name: DetachInstancesFromLoadBalancer
actions.description: Grants permission to detach one or more instances from a load balancer

actions.name: DetachStaticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to detach a static IP from an instance to which it is attached

actions.name: DisableAddOn
actions.description: Grants permission to disable an add-on for an Amazon Lightsail resource

actions.name: DownloadDefaultKeyPair
actions.description: Grants permission to download the default key pair used to authenticate and connect to instances in a specific AWS Region

actions.name: EnableAddOn
actions.description: Grants permission to enable or modify an add-on for an Amazon Lightsail resource

actions.name: ExportSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to export an Amazon Lightsail snapshot to Amazon EC2

actions.name: GetActiveNames
actions.description: Grants permission to get the names of all active (not deleted) resources

actions.name: GetAlarms
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about the configured alarms

actions.name: GetAutoSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to view the available automatic snapshots for an instance or disk

actions.name: GetBlueprints
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of instance images, or blueprints. You can use a blueprint to create a new instance already running a specific operating system, as well as a pre-installed application or development stack. The software that runs on your instance depends on the blueprint you define when creating the instance

actions.name: GetBucketAccessKeys
actions.description: Grants permission to get the existing access key IDs for the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: GetBucketBundles
actions.description: Grants permission to get the bundles that can be applied to an Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: GetBucketMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the data points of a specific metric for an Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: GetBuckets
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about one or more Amazon Lightsail buckets

actions.name: GetBundles
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of instance bundles. You can use a bundle to create a new instance with a set of performance specifications, such as CPU count, disk size, RAM size, and network transfer allowance. The cost of your instance depends on the bundle you define when creating the instance

actions.name: GetCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about one or more Amazon Lightsail SSL/TLS certificates

actions.name: GetCloudFormationStackRecords
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all CloudFormation stacks used to create Amazon EC2 resources from exported Amazon Lightsail snapshots

actions.name: GetContactMethods
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about the configured contact methods

actions.name: GetContainerAPIMetadata
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about Amazon Lightsail containers, such as the current version of the Lightsail Control (lightsailctl) plugin

actions.name: GetContainerImages
actions.description: Grants permission to view the container images that are registered to your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: GetContainerLog
actions.description: Grants permission to view the log events of a container of your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: GetContainerServiceDeployments
actions.description: Grants permission to view the deployments for your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: GetContainerServiceMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to view the data points of a specific metric of your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: GetContainerServicePowers
actions.description: Grants permission to view the list of powers that can be specified for your Amazon Lightsail container services

actions.name: GetContainerServices
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about one or more of your Amazon Lightsail container services

actions.name: GetDisk
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a disk

actions.name: GetDiskSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a disk snapshot

actions.name: GetDiskSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all disk snapshots

actions.name: GetDisks
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all disks

actions.name: GetDistributionBundles
actions.description: Grants permission to view the list of bundles that can be applied to you Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distributions

actions.name: GetDistributionLatestCacheReset
actions.description: Grants permission to view the timestamp and status of the last cache reset of a specific Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: GetDistributionMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to view the data points of a specific metric for an Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: GetDistributions
actions.description: Grants permission to view information about one or more of your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distributions

actions.name: GetDomain
actions.description: Grants permission to get DNS records for a domain resource

actions.name: GetDomains
actions.description: Grants permission to get DNS records for all domain resources

actions.name: GetExportSnapshotRecords
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all records of exported Amazon Lightsail snapshots to Amazon EC2

actions.name: GetInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about an instance

actions.name: GetInstanceAccessDetails
actions.description: Grants permission to get temporary keys you can use to authenticate and connect to an instance

actions.name: GetInstanceMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the data points for the specified metric of an instance

actions.name: GetInstancePortStates
actions.description: Grants permission to get the port states of an instance

actions.name: GetInstanceSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about an instance snapshot

actions.name: GetInstanceSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all instance snapshots

actions.name: GetInstanceState
actions.description: Grants permission to get the state of an instance

actions.name: GetInstances
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all instances

actions.name: GetKeyPair
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a key pair

actions.name: GetKeyPairs
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all key pairs

actions.name: GetLoadBalancer
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a load balancer

actions.name: GetLoadBalancerMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the data points for the specified metric of a load balancer

actions.name: GetLoadBalancerTlsCertificates
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a load balancer's TLS certificates

actions.name: GetLoadBalancerTlsPolicies
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of TLS security policies that you can apply to Lightsail load balancers

actions.name: GetLoadBalancers
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about load balancers

actions.name: GetOperation
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about an operation. Operations include events such as when you create an instance, allocate a static IP, attach a static IP, and so on

actions.name: GetOperations
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all operations. Operations include events such as when you create an instance, allocate a static IP, attach a static IP, and so on

actions.name: GetOperationsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to get operations for a resource

actions.name: GetRegions
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all valid AWS Regions for Amazon Lightsail

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseBlueprints
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of relational database images, or blueprints. You can use a blueprint to create a new database running a specific database engine. The database engine that runs on your database depends on the blueprint you define when creating the relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseBundles
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of relational database bundles. You can use a bundle to create a new database with a set of performance specifications, such as CPU count, disk size, RAM size, network transfer allowance, and standard of high availability. The cost of your database depends on the bundle you define when creating the relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to get events for a relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseLogEvents
actions.description: Grants permission to get events for the specified log stream of a relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseLogStreams
actions.description: Grants permission to get the log streams available for a relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseMasterUserPassword
actions.description: Grants permission to get the master user password of a relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseMetricData
actions.description: Grants permission to get the data points for the specified metric of a relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to get the parameters of a relational database

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshot
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a relational database snapshot

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabaseSnapshots
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all relational database snapshots

actions.name: GetRelationalDatabases
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all relational databases

actions.name: GetStaticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about a static IP

actions.name: GetStaticIps
actions.description: Grants permission to get information about all static IPs

actions.name: ImportKeyPair
actions.description: Grants permission to import a public key from a key pair

actions.name: IsVpcPeered
actions.description: Grants permission to get a boolean value indicating whether the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) is peered

actions.name: OpenInstancePublicPorts
actions.description: Grants permission to add, or open a public port of an instance

actions.name: PeerVpc
actions.description: Grants permission to try to peer the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) with the default VPC

actions.name: PutAlarm
actions.description: Grants permission to creates or update an alarm, and associate it with the specified metric

actions.name: PutInstancePublicPorts
actions.description: Grants permission to set the specified open ports for an instance, and closes all ports for every protocol not included in the request

actions.name: RebootInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to reboot an instance that is in a running state

actions.name: RebootRelationalDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to reboot a relational database that is in a running state

actions.name: RegisterContainerImage
actions.description: Grants permission to register a container image to your Amazon Lightsail container service

actions.name: ReleaseStaticIp
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a static IP

actions.name: ResetDistributionCache
actions.description: Grants permission to delete currently cached content from your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: SendContactMethodVerification
actions.description: Grants permission to send a verification request to an email contact method to ensure it's owned by the requester

actions.name: SetIpAddressType
actions.description: Grants permission to set the IP address type for a Amazon Lightsail resource

actions.name: SetResourceAccessForBucket
actions.description: Grants permission to set the Amazon Lightsail resources that can access the specified Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: StartInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to start an instance that is in a stopped state

actions.name: StartRelationalDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to start a relational database that is in a stopped state

actions.name: StopInstance
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an instance that is in a running state

actions.name: StopRelationalDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a relational database that is in a running state

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

actions.name: TestAlarm
actions.description: Grants permission to test an alarm by displaying a banner on the Amazon Lightsail console or if a notification trigger is configured for the specified alarm, by sending a notification to the notification protocol

actions.name: UnpeerVpc
actions.description: Grants permission to try to unpeer the Amazon Lightsail virtual private cloud (VPC) from the default VPC

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

actions.name: UpdateBucket
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: UpdateBucketBundle
actions.description: Grants permission to update the bundle, or storage plan, of an existing Amazon Lightsail bucket

actions.name: UpdateContainerService
actions.description: Grants permission to update the configuration of your Amazon Lightsail container service, such as its power, scale, and public domain names

actions.name: UpdateDistribution
actions.description: Grants permission to update an existing Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution or its configuration

actions.name: UpdateDistributionBundle
actions.description: Grants permission to update the bundle of your Amazon Lightsail content delivery network (CDN) distribution

actions.name: UpdateDomainEntry
actions.description: Grants permission to update a domain recordset after it is created

actions.name: UpdateInstanceMetadataOptions
actions.description: Grants permission to update metadata options for an instance

actions.name: UpdateLoadBalancerAttribute
actions.description: Grants permission to update a load balancer attribute, such as the health check path and session stickiness

actions.name: UpdateRelationalDatabase
actions.description: Grants permission to update a relational database

actions.name: UpdateRelationalDatabaseParameters
actions.description: Grants permission to update the parameters of a relational database
